metadataAttributes.Title: Biostatistics in Public Health  Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Build Statistical Skills for Biological Sciences. Master the tools and methods you need to analyze, interpret, and communicate biostatistical data.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Statistics, Statistical Hypothesis Testing, variability, regression, Normal Distribution, summary measures, binary data, Confidence Interval, p values, sampling, P-Value, Proportional Hazards Model,
